alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:35PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hendry, northwestern Palm Beach and southern Glades Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 335 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clewiston to Lion Country Safari Park. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Canal Point, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, Lion Country Safari Park, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, Loxahatchee Groves, The Acreage, Loxahatchee NWR and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County
